name: VR Minigolf
description:
Here a VR game for casual fun and some VR parties. Is a really simple game where you use one button to teleport and the stick to hit the ball. 

The score system is also so simple, it counts the balls you use per level!

This game is perfect for casual fun with VR newcomers and family, give it a try!

NOTE: this game was develop with the HTC vive, it is supossed to work in every VR device but i cound't try it
